refnamediv.refpurpose: The polkit system daemon configuration file

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: The polkitd.conf file is the configuration file for the polkitd system daemon. The configuration format is INI style, with sections and key=value pairs.

The configuration file located at /etc/polkit-1/polkitd.conf has the highest precedence, if found. If not, /run/polkit-1/polkitd.conf will be used. If neither file is found, /usr/lib/polkit-1/polkitd.conf will be used. If no configuration file is found, default settings compiled into polkitd will be used.

refsect1.title: [Polkitd] SECTION
refsect1.para: The [Polkitd] section accepts the following keys.

refsect2.title: ExpirationSeconds=
refsect2.para: Specifies the default expiration time, in seconds, for temporary authorizations granted by polkitd via interactive authentication. The default value is 300 (5 minutes).
